H0.text: method used by a writer to develop a character. Characterization

H1.text: method used by a writer to develop a character. Foil

H2.text: method used by a writer to develop a character. Symbolism

H3.text: method used by a writer to develop a character. Hamartia

A4.text: In any narrative, a foil is a character who contrasts with another character, typically, a character who contrasts with the protagonist, in order to better highlight or differentiate certain qualities of the protagonist.

A5.text: A foil to the protagonist may also be the antagonist of the plot.
